data.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms　VI with Power Up Kit / 三國志VI with パワーアップキット
data.detailed_description:
To commemorate Kou Shibusawa's 35th anniversary, the "Kou Shibusawa Archives" will be opened in the Steam Store. Here we will revive popular previously released titles.

In this sixth round of releases, we offer "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅵ with Power Up Kit," an expanded version of the 6th game in the series.
"Time of the Heavens" is depicted in dramatic historical events that enliven the world of the Three Kingdoms. "Advantage of the Land" gives strategic advantages based on castle location, economic strengths in farming and trade, and so on. "Bonds of People" allow people to tell their dreams and listen to the opinions of other officers. Use Time, Advantage and Bonds to conquer the continent.
data.about_the_game:
To commemorate Kou Shibusawa's 35th anniversary, the "Kou Shibusawa Archives" will be opened in the Steam Store. Here we will revive popular previously released titles.

In this sixth round of releases, we offer "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅵ with Power Up Kit," an expanded version of the 6th game in the series.
"Time of the Heavens" is depicted in dramatic historical events that enliven the world of the Three Kingdoms. data.short_description: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅵ with Power Up Kit" is an expanded version of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅵ," which was released in 1998 as the 6th game in the series. "Time of the Heavens" is depicted in dramatic historical events that enliven the world of the Three Kingdoms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7(*Japanese Ver. only)
  • Processor: 1GHz over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 800x600 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7(*Japanese Ver. only)
  • Processor: 1GHz over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 800x600 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
